ai-anya-e0105n12:1_0: This is the lady of the dwellings, namely, clans, obedients, shamelessly important people, for the sake of the authority, whisposition, in accordance with the Teaching, the maintained by the Buddha, the brahmin Vedas, together with their vocabularies, ritual, preference, and announced for the sake of the teaching.
ai-anya-e0105n12:1_1: (but) the Great Monastery, the senior monks who speak in accordance with the Teaching and Discipline taught them. They composed the doctrine and caused them to be prescribed.
ai-anya-e0105n12:1_2: Having heard that, the kingdom of all the earth called Kakusandha, careful building dyed the ministers and counselors, he the ruler of the earth, having destroyed all the Awakened One, ascended all the evil planets, went to the Independent Buddhas, and beaten (the Buddhas) to be conquered the Dhamma.
ai-anya-e0105n12:1_3: for this is said in the Mahāniddesa:
ai-anya-e0105n12:3_0: “After preventing the Mallas, having built a bad friend,
ai-anya-e0105n12:4_0: the Dispensation with the flame, and the Dispensation has been lost.”
